verses.verse: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the mighty will I sing praise unto thee.
I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word and thy name above all.
In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O YHVH, when they hear the words of thy mouth.
Yea, they shall sing in the ways of YHVH: for great is the glory of YHVH.
Though YHVH be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.
Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.
YHVH will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O YHVH, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
